history.content: Why are you asking here? Ask your friend!

I submitted an application to Salesforce. I know an employee there, and he gave me a referral, but he gave me a referral after I submitted the application (so I left the employee referral field blank). The problem is that when he referred me, he couldn't submit his referral since I already submitted my application. Should I resubmit and fill out the employee referral field or should I just wait for Salesforce to get in touch with me? I'm afraid not having the referral will decrease my chances of getting an interview.
history.subject: Question about CS internships (don't know where else to ask for immediate help)
